title: Longhorns Daily News : With Texas , Oklahoma coming aboard , will SEC move to nine - game conference schedule in 2024 ?
body_text:
Heading into the SEC’s annual spring meetings, with the Texas Longhorns and Oklahoma Sooners aboard, albeit without a procedural vote in this case, it’s become a game or will they, or wont’ they. Will they, the SEC, move to a nine-game conference schedule in 2024?
Longhorns Daily News: With Texas, Oklahoma coming aboard, will SEC move to nine-game conference schedule in 2024?
Plus: Texas softball falls to the Tennessee
That, debatably, is the biggest question at hand this spring.
